name: Link Aggregation Group
title: LAG
definition: Identifies this request is ordering Link Aggregation.

validEntry.description: Existing Link Aggregation group. Activity impacting an
existing Link Aggregation group (add or remove
New Link Aggregation group created on this request
(The provider will assign a LAG-ID and provide it on the
Disconnect of entire existing Link Aggregation group.

validEntryNotes: A valid entry of “E” is applicable when the ACT field is “N”, “C” or “D”.
A valid entry of “N” is only applicable when the ACT field is “N”.
A valid entry of “D” is only applicable when the ACT field is “D”.
usageNotes: Optional when the first position of the REQTYP field is “E’’ or “S” and the ACT field is “N”, “C” or “D”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: More information relative to link aggregation can be found in IEEE 802.1AX. When link aggregation pertains to ENNI usage, more information can also be found in MEF 26.1.
